alert.note: Alert for Upper Jefferson; Western Orleans (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 1:26PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Orleans and northwestern Jefferson Parishes through 215 PM CDT... At 126 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Metairie. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Orleans, Metairie, Avondale, Marrero, Harvey, Jefferson, Harahan, Westwego, Elmwood, Bridge City, River Ridge, Waggaman, Ama, New Orleans Armstrong Airport and Lakefront Airport. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 222 and 239. Interstate 610 between mile markers 1 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
